#include<stdio.h>
int gcdl[100005],gcdr[100005],arr[100005];
int gcdfun(int a,int b)
{
if(b==0)
return a;
return gcdfun(b,a%b);
}
int main() 
{
int i,j,k,t,n,l,r,q;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d%d",&n,&q);
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
gcdl[1]=arr[1];
for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
gcdl[i]=gcdfun(arr[i],gcdl[i-1]);
gcdr[n]=arr[n];
for(i=n-1;i>=1;i--)
gcdr[i]=gcdfun(arr[i],gcdr[i+1]);
while(q--)
{
scanf("%d%d",&l,&r);
if(l==1)
{
printf("%d\n",gcdr[r+1]);
}
else if(r==n)
{
printf("%d\n",gcdl[l-1]);
}
else
{
printf("%d\n",gcdfun(gcdl[l-1],gcdr[r+1]));
}
}
}
}
